text: [Music]
hi I'm Matt from Amazon web services and
I'm here in the offices of our friends
at startup weekend in Sunny Seattle with
some good news uh we're very happy to be
able to offer every attendee at an
upcoming startup weekend events $100 of
Amazon web services service credits that
means that you can use our scalable
compute storage and database services to
build wonderful sophisticated
applications that scale up when you need
them and scale back down when you don't
so whether your application needs highly
scalable nosql data stores such as
Amazon Dynamo DB or you're using
relational databases such as SQL server
or MySQL all of these services are
available at the click of a mouse as and
when you need them you'll only pay for
them as and when you use them and you
can scale them up as your application
becomes more popular and scale them back
down uh if it doesn't work out we're
really excited to see what you and your
new teammates build at your next
upcoming startup weekend uh we'll try
and have as many Amazon team members
there to help you out with architectural
details and uh performance support good
luck and see you soon
[Music]
